message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and importance, I am proposing a price of $15,000 for it. This reflects not only its worth but also the opportunity cost for us in terms of time and resources invested. I look forward to your consideration.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I see the value in your product, $15,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it, which aligns with its value to me.  Let me know if that works for you.
